title: Firefox Plushies
content: Hello, I saw on the Internet that there are Firefox Plushies. Is there anywhere to buy them? I haven't really found an answer on https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=322367 either. However, on https://wiki.mozilla.org/GearStore/Gearavailable the product still seems to exist.
creator: m.k2014

title: Zabezpečený prohlížeč
content:
Dobrý den, po poslední aktualizaci se přestal automaticky otevírat zabezpečený prohlížeč ve spojení s produktem ESET security, do této aktualizace fungoval normálně. V jiných prohlížečích funguje. S podporou ESET jsme vyloučili vliv samotného produktu ESET a vzhledem k tomu že v jiných prohlížečích funguje bezproblemově soudím že musí být problem v samotném Firefoxu. Provedl jsem vymazání cache a historie prohlížeče a funkčnost se neobnovila.

Děkuji za prověření a informace k tomuto problemu.
creator: radekhurvajz

title: Update 115.0.2 Problem
content: Your latest update wiped my pinned tabs and current open tabs. Any way to fix that short of going back to a restore point? Thanks.
creator: digimage

title: want to make my Primary Password secure
content: I recently switched over to Firefox as my main browser in place of Chrome. What really won me over was the Primary Password feature, so that my saved passwords will be safe. But I'm a little confused: When I open Firefox, the dialog box comes up asking me for my Primary Password. As soon as I type the first two characters of my password, the browser is totally unlocked. I can either type in the rest of my password at that point and press Enter, or I can just press the Cancel button. Either way it only needs the first two characters of my password to unlock Firefox. That doesn't seem very secure. Is there any way to set it to require my entire password?
creator: scott185

title: Windows Message about Virus
content:
Hello,

I get alot of windows notifications about virus, attacks etc. See uploaded images, how can I prevent these.
creator: c.chen

title: Il Modulo Widevine Content Decryption non si installa
content: Il Modulo Widevine Content Decryption fornito da Google Inc. non si installa e il download rmane sempre bloccato, questo non mi permette di utilizzare il browser per vedere i video di piattaforme come netflix e prime video, per cui sono alla ricerca di una possibile risoluzione. anticpo il fatto che il mio sistema operativo è macos 13. Vi ringrazio in anticipo per la cortese collaborazione. Vi allego quanto risulta, e vi anticipo che ho provato ad installare e disinstallare il browser diverse volte.
creator: pino.cacciatorereg

title: 关于火狐容器扩展和第三方的临时容器扩展
content: 1.火狐容器扩展会记录临时容器扩展打开的身份标签页面，这对于同步来说很不友好，因为我并不需要同步临时容器 2.火狐容器扩展没有提供可以一次删除多个身份的功能，这很麻烦

title: Trouble with gmail when using firefox
content: When using firefox to access my gmail, if I open a page in gmail I am unable to close that page (nothing on that page works freezes). I am unable to transfer that file to my favourites. The only way to close the page is to close the tab, this is not my preferred way of using gmail. Any help would be greatly appreciated Regards Mick
creator: 13tif24

title: update to firefox latest release
content: I am presently running ver 115.0.2. This morning, following a firefox update, I was told there was a new version available. When I clicked the link I was shown ver 115. I did note that there is a ver 116 when I checked the drop down menu. A few moments ago I clicked an update to latest version link here and got the same version I have and from the firefox help menu I see that my firefox is up to date. So the obvious question is, do I even bother to dl ver 116?
creator: Rosaliy-Lynne

title: How to import password csv?
content: So I'm using firefox on my old PC and want to export the login data to my new PC. Firefox has export passwords to CSV but there is no import CSV in firefox on the new PC. There's import HTML but... firefox exported to CSV not HTML so I'm really confused, why would it export to a format that cannot be import?
creator: CorkyKitty

title: how to disable common users to modify the settings of "No proxy for" in "Connection Settings"
content: I am an admin of some servers, i modify the proxy settings of firefox in a GPO, and it works, but now ont thing is that users can modify the settings of "No proxy for" in Connection Settings, then add the urls, then users can access to any web site which they want to, is there a method to disable this? thanks.
creator: fas910

title: Custom new tab page keeps reverting to Firefox home
content:
This issue is so annoying, that I need to ask Firefox community what I can do. So, the problem is, that if I set custom home page called Infinity New Tab (Pro), then I will restart Firefox, then it reverts back to Firefox Home.

I think, that this is completely unrelated to malware, because I'm scanning my computer very often.

Are my preferences/settings corrupted?

However the Infinity New Tab (Pro) is no longer available in addons.mozilla.org, so if you need .xpi file, then tell me, and I will attach that file here.
creator: pk22.games1

title: Accessing the "see original listing" on items that have sold on Ebay.
content:
I sell on Ebay. I have always used Firefox to access the "SOLD" listings in Ebay like the item I'm going to sell. Recently when I look at the SOLD listings the "see original listing" option is not there. I need to access this information to decide what price I'm going to ask for my item! I talked with Ebay and they walked me though the issue. In order to determine if it was an Ebay problem or a Firefox problem I opened Chrome and did the same search. I was able with Chrome to "see original listing" so this is obviously a Firefox issue. Since I've been using this information for over 10 years, it must be a recent update that caused me to lose this function. i've used Firefox exclusively for all my browser use. I don't want to change to Chrome! Help!

Rachel
creator: rachel38

title: "Restore previous session" is no longer an option on the History tab or in the 3-bar menu. Windows 10 114.0.2
content: My tabs keep disappearing and I have to restart manually. I used to go to the 3 bar menu and select Restore previous session but now it doesn't appear in the menu.

title: Pinned newtab links from another device
content:
Hello, on one of my computers I have my new tab set to have 10 rows of pinned links. I went to `about:config` and copied the `browser.newtabpage.pinned` string. I then pasted it into the string on a new device I'm setting up, but it doesn't do anything.

Is there any way to get this working? My new tab on the device I'm setting up has none of the pinned links, just sites I commonly visit

Thanks, let me know if I need to provide any more information.
creator: jack.a.watt
